title: Chapter 4290 - Chapter 4290: 4289 On The Negotiation
body:
Chapter 4290 - Chapter 4290: 4289 On The Negotiation

Chapter 4290: 4289 on the negotiation

Translator: 549690339

“He wants to obtain those elemental gods and destroy our elemental divine tower!”

When Saint Shan Tian saw Wang Xian rushing towards the tower, his face was extremely embarrassed.

They could only pin down Wang Xian, but it was impossible to trap him in a single area.

Now that Wang Xian was targeting those towers, Saint Shan Tian and the rest couldn’t stop him at all!

“We can’t let him take the god of elements away. I’ll hold him back. You guys take the god of elements away!”

Saint Shan Tian continued to roar loudly!

His body trembled and began to grow bigger.

In an instant, he transformed into an incomparably huge giant that covered the sky.

He extended a finger and pointed it directly at Wang Xian!

That finger broke off from his palm and carried an invincible might.

Beside him, the expressions of the other three Heaven’s origin powerhouses changed when they saw their sect leader attacking at the cost of sacrificing his life force.

They quickly grabbed at the fragments of the Elemental God!

These fragments of the Elemental God were extremely important to their goodness heaven world.

This was the strongest elemental god that their goodness heaven world had gathered over the past tens of billions of years.

“Hehe!”

When Wang Xian saw that the saint of Goodness Heaven wanted to stop him, a cold expression appeared on his face.

“Roar! Roar!”

Wang Xian let out a low roar. He swayed his huge body and went straight for the broken finger of the Saint of Goodness Heaven.

At the same time, the body of the Void Divine Dragon flew out from his body.

Carrying the five elements millstone, the Void Dragon Pool teleported and clawed at the elemental gods one by one!

“Bang!”

In the next instant, Wang Xian’s dragon claw wrapped around the Tai Chi Dragon Disk and directly resisted the broken finger of Saint Shan Tian.

A huge explosion sounded as the broken finger collided with the Dragon Claw.

A deep wound appeared on Wang Xian’s Dragon Claw!

The energy carried by the broken finger caused Wang Xian’s dragon claw to be slightly broken!

However, the flesh and blood started to heal rapidly at the place where it was broken!

When Saint Shan Tian saw this scene, there wasn’t the slightest hint of surprise on his face.

He looked to the side and his expression sank.

He had sacrificed one of his fingers to unleash an attack that had injured his opponent.

However, the terrifying existence in front of him had split out a powerful force.

This force instantly arrived in front of an elemental god!

“This is the power of space. From his body, I can feel the power of other attributes. How many abilities and trump cards does this mysterious powerhouse have?”

The saint of Good Days Face is embarrassed low voice roar way!

“Stop!”

At this time, the three strong Tianyuan creation, thought that their patriarch can resist that strong enemy.

However, they did not expect that just when they put away the first elemental god, a doppelganger of the powerful enemy instantly arrived in front of a fragment of the Elemental God.

They could only watch helplessly as he kept the fragment of the god of elements in his bag!

This made their expressions extremely awkward!

“Hehe, you think you can stop me just because of your sect leader? All of you together won’t be able to stop me!”

Wang Xian looked at them and sneered. He stared at the other god of elements fragments and flew over directly!

“I’ll stop him. All of you, put away the fragment of the god of elements!”

One of the control-level powerhouses roared and attacked the body of the void God Dragon!

“Hehe!”

Wang Xian’s body of the void God dragon laughed coldly. He waved his arm and the five elements grinding mill and the void dragon pool emitted a terrifying energy, forming a powerful defense in front of him!

Following that, his figure disappeared instantly and teleported to another fragment of the god of elements!

With a wave of his arm, he kept it in his bag!

Even though there was an energy protection around the fragment of the god of elements, it was still easily destroyed by Wang Xian.

“Not good. He has the space attribute and is very difficult to deal with!”

The expression of the control-level powerhouse changed drastically. Knowing that he could not restrain his opponent, he gave up and started to collect the fragments of the god of elements one by one!

Saint Shan Tian swept his gaze over and his expression was abnormally ugly!

He took a deep breath and stared at Wang Xian. He stopped his attempts to stop and attack!

“My friend, I know it’s My Fault for taking the initiative to attack. Take as many God of elements fragments as you can. Can We have a talk?”

Saint Shan Tian gave up completely.

He couldn’t beat Wang Xian in a fight.

He couldn’t stop him even if he wanted to.

He might as well give up generously.

Compared to the fragment of the god of elements, the fragment of the star field was more important to him.

He didn’t want to get into a deadlock with Wang Xian!

If he became his enemy, he would never be able to recover the ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin in the star field!

“Hehe, now you know how to have a talk?”

Wang Xian stared at Saint Shan Tian with a mocking expression on his face. However, Wang Xian did not continue to attack!

With the Void Dragon Body’s rapid teleportation, he obtained pieces of the god of elements!

Out of the eight pieces of the god of elements, he had snatched a total of five pieces.

These five pieces were much more precious than the ones he had obtained from the surroundings of the tree of chaos.

One fragment was equivalent to almost all of them.

“These five fragments of the god of elements are equivalent to your feeble apology just now!”

Wang Xian calmed his mind and the body of the Void Divine Dragon returned to his body.

He looked at these five fragments of the god of elements and said with a smile on his face!

“You…”

When the other three Heaven’s origin creation stage powerhouses heard Wang Xian’s words, a hint of anger appeared on their faces.

They had never suffered such humiliation before.

However, when they thought of the methods of this mysterious powerhouse, they could only hold back the rest of their words!

“My friend, I want to exchange for the galactic fragment in your hands. Name a price!”

Saint Shan Tian took a deep breath, looked at Wang Xian, and asked.

“I want to exchange for the galactic fragment in your hands. What Price Do you want?”

Wang Xian asked back when he heard his words. The smile on his face disappeared.

Currently, the galactic fragment that the other party possessed could restore the entire galaxy to the state of the Heaven’s origin creation!

This was also very important to Wang Xian.

A complete treasure of the Heaven’s origin creation could only be obtained by chance!

Even a great dao expert would fight for it!

However, Wang Xian already understood the other party’s strength.

Although it was inferior to him, it was impossible for him to kill the other party.

Similarly, the other party wanted to trade with him because he saw how powerful he was.

Now, it would depend on who offered the highest price and who could move the other party!

“The star field used to Be My Heaven’s origin Destiny Treasure. It was shattered due to an accident. I have been searching for it for tens of billions of years. I will not give it up, nor will I hand it over to others.”

Saint Shan Tian said with a determined gaze. He looked at Wang Xian and gritted his teeth. “Name a price. As long as I can afford it, I will agree!”
